data.title: Whole Hog Sports
data.text:
POS: C/PF | TEAM: Charlotte Hornets | HOMETOWN: Monticello, Miss.

Jefferson is the only Arkansas basketball signee to be drafted in the first round.

Alongside the likes of Steven Hill, Darian Townes and Charles Thomas, he was part of Stan Heath's first full signing class in 2003, but signed with the Boston Celtics after the franchise selected him with the 15th pick overall.

Jefferson has spent 12 seasons in the NBA with four different teams. He has career averages of 16.7 points and 8.9 rebounds per game, and in 2014 was named to the All-NBA third team.

NEXT>>
